de.lessvoid.nifty.types

Class NiftyMutableColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.types.NiftyMutableColor

  • public class NiftyMutableColor
extends Object
    A Mutable color implementation used when colors will need to be animated.
    Author:
    void

    • Constructor Summary

      Create a color from a immutable NiftyColor.

      • linear

        public NiftyMutableColor linear(NiftyColor start,
                                NiftyColor end,
                                double t)
        Linear interpolate between the start color and the end color using the given t which needs to be in [0, 1]
        Parameters:
        start - start color
        end - end color
        t - the parameter for the linear interpolation. If this value is 0 this will be set to start color and if it's 1 this will be the end color.
        Returns:
        this

      • mutiply

        public NiftyMutableColor mutiply(double factor)
        Multiply all of the color components by the given factor. This color is being changed.
        Parameters:
        factor - the factor to apply
        Returns:
        this
